text: Hortenius, Friend of Nero is a 1936 novel by Edith Pargeter. In it, Hortensius attempts to save the Christian wife of a friend in the arena, an act for which he is forced to flee by Nero, along with a Persian slave whom he falls for.https://www.kirkusreviews.com/book-reviews/edith-pargeter-2/hortensius- friend-of-nero/ Kirkushttps://trove.nla.gov.au/work/17527510?q&versionId;=231340329 NLA It was Pargeter's first historical novel. ==References== Category:1936 novels Category:Novels set in ancient Rome
